frame.name: First_experience
frame.definition:
<def-root>An implicit experiencer has an <fen>Experience</fen> for the first time. Some LU's may specifically imply an agentive activity.
<ex><fex name="cxt">In Italy</fex> <fex name="exp">the term was</fex> <t>first</t> <fex name="exp">used by the Venetians in 1546</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="cxt">This time</fex>, <fex name="exp">the comet was</fex> <t>first</t> <fex name="exp">seen on the night of 19th October, 1805 by European observers Jean Louis Pons, Johann Sigismund Huth, and Alexis Bouvard</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experience
FE.definition:
<def-root>An event happens for the first time within the <fen>Context</fen>.
<ex><fex name="exp">Made from flax, linen was</fex> <t>first</t> <fex name="exp">used by the ancient Egyptians</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="exp">The Cobra was</fex> <t>first</t> <fex name="exp">deployed to Vietnam in September 1967</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Context
FE.definition:
<def-root>A spatial, cultural, or personal delimitation within which the <fen>Experience</fen> occurs for the first time.
<ex><fex name="cxt">In Germany</fex> the pamphlet was <t>first</t> used by the leaders of the Protestant Reformation to inflame popular opinion against the pope</ex></def-root>
